page.title: 03TRADE
page.content: Wrestlingworth has a village general store with a Post Office included. A shop dealing with furniture repairs and upholstery has recently opened. A craft shop, in a thatched cottage on the edge of the village closed in 1983. There is a garage to repair cars but no petrol station. There are two public houses -The Chequers and the Queen Victoria. A General Stores and a butchers shop closed in recent years. There are no police living in the village although there has been in the past. There is a mushroom farm along the Eyeworth Road opposite the sewage works.
